attributes.action: Disband the UK Government and Parliament Petitions Office.
attributes.background: Have you seen the state of our democracy recently ?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you want the UK Government and Parliament to close the petitions website, you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/251900

If you would like another general election you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
